alert.note: Alert for Lancaster; Northumberland; Richmond (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 14 at 10:28PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Northumberland, southeastern Richmond and Lancaster Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1028 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Robley, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph, half inch hail, and frequent lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Frequent cloud to ground lightning strikes. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Morattico around 1040 PM EDT. Lancaster around 1055 PM EDT. Kilmarnock around 1110 PM EDT. Urbanna and White Stone around 1115 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Byrdton, Regina, Mollusk, Senora, Avalon, Brook Vale, Nuttsville, Bertrand, Belle Isle State Park and Millenbeck. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
